comments.text: Every time I'm setting a dependency in Bugzilla, I have to double check the bug number to make sure I've got it right.  It would be great if Bugzilla would display a popup (like it does for the CC field) showing the summary of the bug number I've just entered, so that I would know if I'm making the mistake before changing the dependencies.
